"Reset phone, erasing all your data and applications? Action cannot be reversed or cancelled.
It is recommended to connect the phone to the charger during this reset process."
Erase entire SD card as well
Resetting your phone will take up to 10 minutes.
"Your phone cannot be reset because your battery is low. Please charge your battery to at least 25% and try again."
Encrypted files on your memory cards will become unreadable. It is advisable to connect your device to a PC and copy the files you would like to keep from each card before resetting the device.
" Encrypted files created on this phone and saved to the memory cards will become unreadable."
Enhanced location provider using assisted GPS, preferred service

Set up and manage recurring synchronization

"The 'Basic Location On' Location setting enables third party access to location information through software, widgets or peripheral components, you choose to download, add or attach to your wireless device or through web access, messaging capabilities or other means. By selecting this setting you authorize Verizon Wireless to disclose your location data to third parties. Enabling or disabling this setting will not affect 911 emergency calls."

"The location setting on your device is set to 'Basic Location On'. The 'Basic Location On' setting enables third party access to location information through software, widgets or peripheral components, you choose to download, add or attach to your wireless device or through web access, messaging capabilities or other means. By selecting this setting you authorize Verizon Wireless to disclose your location data to third parties. Enabling or disabling this setting will not affect 911 emergency calls."

"The 'Preferred Location On' Location setting enables access to approved Verizon Wireless location aware applications which you select and authorize to access and use your location from the network as well as to third party applications you choose to download, add or attach to your wireless device or through web access, messaging capabilities or other means. By selecting this setting you authorize Verizon Wireless to disclose your location data for location aware services that you select to use. Enabling or disabling this setting will not affect 911 emergency calls."

"The location setting on your device is set to 'Preferred Location On'. The 'Preferred Location On' Location setting enables access to approved Verizon Wireless location aware applications which you select and authorize to access and use your location from the network as well as to third party applications you choose to download, add or attach to your wireless device or through web access, messaging capabilities or other means. By selecting this setting you authorize Verizon Wireless to disclose your location data for location aware services that you select to use. Enabling or disabling this setting will not affect 911 emergency calls."

Allow Voice Commands to be launched via Bluetooth Multi-function button while device is locked
This feature will enable access to your device via Voice Commands, through the multi-function button of a connected Bluetooth device, even when the security lock is active.
Please remember your MOTOBLUR ID to re-login to device.
This device does not have a Google account associated with it. If you forget your PIN, it cannot be sent to you and a factory reset will have to be performed to recover the device.
This device does not have a Google mail account associated with it. If you forget your PIN, it cannot be sent to you and a factory reset will have to be performed to recover the device.
Locks your device automatically when inserted in pocket
Software updates are not available without a MOTOBLUR account. Would you like to setup an account now?
Protect the data on your phone or memory card. Requires screen lock
In order to better protect your data, please setup a screen lock for your device before encrypting your data.
Erases all data on the internal storage
This action will erase the internal storage on the phone. You will lose all the data on the internal storage!
Format internal storage, erasing all your media? Action cannot be reversed!
Enroll fingerprints and setup a backup password to unlock screen
Also clear all associated data & optimizations
You already have a fingerprint profile set up. Do you want to reuse your existing profile?
Warning: Clearing the stored fingerprints will erase data and optimizations associated with those fingerprints.
Are you sure you want to delete the existing fingerprint profile including all associated data and optimization?
Set up a recovery PIN in case you are unable to scan your fingerprints.

" Erasing Internal Storage (media area) will erase all your personal data on the phone internal storage, such as applications, application data, music, movies and photos. Your personal data will be erased and unrecoverable. This operation cannot be reversed or cancelled."
" To also clear all personal content, the "SD card and the internal storage (media area) needs to be erased. Please select either additional option:
Erase all the data on the phone internal storage, such as applications, music, movies or photos.

Your Google account" "

One or more of the Location settings is enabled on your device. Consequently, you are enabling access to location information which could pose certain risks to users of this device. Verizon Wireless encourages you to check your wireless device periodically and only use software, widgets, peripheral components and services from reliable sources. Verizon Wireless makes no representation of accuracy, completeness or timeliness of any location data, product or service.
You need to disconnect your PC to change this setting

Unmount the internal storage for formatting
Mount the internal storage to access content
If you unmount the internal storage, some applications you are using will stop and may be unavailable until you remount the internal storage.
Cannot unmount internal storage. Try again later.
Internal storage will be unmounted. Check the notification area for status.
Use Location Services Provided by Verizon Wireless

By selecting \"VZW Location Services\", you are enabling Verizon Wireless and third party authenticated and validated location services to access to certain location information available through this device and/or the network.
Use Location Services Provided by Google
Location Services based on Standalone GPS

By selecting \"Standalone GPS Services\", you are enabling access to all location information by any third party through web access or any software or peripheral components you chose to install, download, add or attach to the device or any other means. Enabling this functionality could pose certain risks to users of this device.

Must draw pattern to unlock screen
How to draw an unlock pattern

"Protect your phone from unauthorized use by creating a personal screen unlock pattern. "" "1" On the next screen, watch while an example pattern is drawn. "" "2" When ready, draw your own personal unlock pattern. Experiment with different patterns but connect at least four dots. "" "3" Redraw your pattern to confirm. "" "Ready to start? Touch “Next”". "" "To leave your phone unprotected, touch “Cancel”." "

"Connect at least four dots.
Touch “Next” when you’re ready to draw your own pattern."
